name: Workshop No. 9
description:
You are tasked with finding and defeating the Box Demon lurking somewhere in a workshop. Use your special laser weapon to solve puzzles and make your way to the end!

Workshop No. 9 is a very short and simple game I created in my free time. If you enjoyed it, please let me know in the comments!

CONTROLS

  • A & D to move left and right
  • Space bar to jump
  • J to fire laser
  • i to aim up
  • W to teleport (when prompted)

Game Developed by: Brent Jones
Music by: Steven Melin (Lo-Fi Atmospheres Music Pack) https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/electronic/lo-fi-atmospheres-m...

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/AntaresStudioGames
